arts.ttl: Wolfsburg players react following victory against Gladbach
arts.sum: Lukas Nmecha, Lovro Majer, and Maximilian Arnold spoke to the club and media representatives, following Wolfsburg's 1-0 win away in Mönchengladbach on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Gladbach vs. Wolfsburg preview: Two mid-table teams looking to finish a few places higher
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach (13-6-14, 10th) face VfL Wolfsburg (10-10-13, 12th) at Borussia-Park. Both teams have no chance of qualifying for European competition, but Gladbach can finish seventh in the table and Wolfsburg eleventh with a win.
